== Pavithreswaram (628404) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Pavithreswaram is a village in the [[Kottarakkara]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 2221 hectares and harbouring 6888 households with total population of 26041 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 23 km. Male population is 12282 and female population is 13759. Scheduled Caste Population is 6195 and Scheduled Tribes population is 126. Census Location Code of the village is 628404<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
